law.catch_line: On or before August 15, 1986, the Secretary shall:...
law.text:
On or before August 15, 1986, the Secretary shall:
provide for the adoption of a specified form or forms to be used in applying for the criminal history records check to be issued by the Department, including an appropriate disclosure statement;
designate the appropriate State or local law enforcement offices in the State, or other approved locations, where fingerprints may be obtained and application for a criminal history records check may be made; and
adopt rules and regulations necessary and reasonable to administer this Part VI of this subtitle.
